Intel, WAV500, S6464L89, SLLQJ; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Product code: 90IG03W1-BM3010, 90IG03W1-BA1000 {{see also|Phicomm K3C A1|Arcadyan}} *'''Ultimate Wi-Fi Speed''' - Concurrent dual-band AC2600 Wi-Fi for smooth streaming. *'''With Intel technology''', Blue Cave can handle the simultaneous demands from :an increasing number of connected devices in your home. *'''The First Commercial-grade Security for Home Networks''' - AiProtection protects :every connected smart device on your network, including IoT devices. *'''Family Overview''' - Easily monitor and control each family member’s internet :and app usage from your mobile device. *'''Make Your Smart Home Smarter With IFTTT''' - Combine Blue Cave with other :IFTTT-compatible devices and apps to create smart automated tasks. *'''Easy PC-free Network Control''' - Use your smartphone or tablet as your network :control center, with notifications for network activity, security reports and more. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] ''AnyWAN'' [https://ark.intel.com/products/92553/Intel-AnyWAN-GRX350-Network-Processors GRX350] @800 MHz Dual Core (Seale) :PXB4583EL1600 (SLLFB) Network Processor - [[MIPS]] ([http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lantiq-announces-carrier-class-network-processing-for-home-gateway-300050735.html interAptiv]) *Wireless Chipset: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PSB83514/PSB83524 ([http://www.intel.la/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/xway-wi-fi-chipset-wav500-series-brief.pdf WAV500]) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4 GHz), 802.11an/ac (5 GHz) *Wireless Speed: 800Mbps for 2.4 GHz, 1733Mbps for 5 GHz *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM, :Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control, IPv6, AiMesh *Antenna: 4x internal [http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20161212006180/en/ ''SkyCross iMAT''] antennas *Flash: 128MB (SLC NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 1x USB 3.0 *Operation Mode: Router, Access point *Power: DC 19V/1.75A adapter *Dimensions: 160x160x80 mm (WxDxH) (without bezel) *Weight: 800g ===GPL Info=== *[https://github.com/paldier/bluecave-merlin BlueCave (Merlin Fork) FW] {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
export BLUECAVE := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y PARENTAL2=y \
        ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" GRO=y APP="network" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="BLUECAVE" SHP=y \
        ODMPID=y UBI=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=n BWDPI=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y \
        OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y CAPTIVE_PORTAL=n HD_SPINDOWN=y MULTICASTIPTV=y QUAGGA=y DETWAN=n \
	WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y TIMEMACHINE=y \
	NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" TFAT=y DISK_MONITOR=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y \
	BLINK_LED=n WANRED_LED=y PWRRED_LED=y FO_LED=y EJUSB_BTN=y SW_DEVLED=y\
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y DISABLE_PROXYSTA_UI=n NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y ATF=y UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=n WPSMULTIBAND=n \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="" \
	VLAN_TAGGED_BASE=n LAN50=y ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y \
	QTN=n LANTIQ=y NVRAM_FILE=n BT_CONN=y I2CTOOLS=y \
	NEWSSID_REV2=y IFTTT=y ALEXA=y EMAIL=y NVRAM_64K=y FORCE_AUTO_UPGRADE=y \
	SW_HW_AUTH=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y NATNL_AIHOME=y \
	AMAS=y ETHOBD=y LETSENCRYPT=y UTF8_SSID=y DWB=y NO_TRY_DWB_PROFILE=y
}} ==Links of Interest== ===Rewiews=== *[https://www.techbang.com/posts/56963-elegant-exterior-into-the-home-life-support-alexa-and-ifttt-asus-blue-cave-wireless-router ''ASUS Blue Cave'' on '''TechBang'''] (Teardown, internal images) :• CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)|Intel]] ''AnyWAN GRX350'' PXB4583EL1600 [https://cdn2-techbang.pixfs.net/system/images/431618/original/5188135e2bb7cb609013125e07bd8e86.png @800MHz DualCore] :• Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF1G18AC-TI 128MB (1Gb SLC NAND) :• RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI 512MB (DDR3 1600MHz) :• WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)|Intel]] PSB83514M (WAV514), PSB83524M (WAV524) :• Bluetooth: [[Atheros]] AR3012-BL3D (BT 4.0 + HS) :• Antenna: 2.4/5.2/5.8 GHz, 1x 2 dBi (Bluetooth) ::1x 3.05/4.83/3.69 dBi, 1x 2.89/3.20/4.85 dBi ::1x 2.88/2.56/2.77 dBi, 1x 1.69/3.82/2.79 dBi :• Ports: 5x GbE (10/100/1000), 1x USB 3.1 (Gen1) *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-blue-cave-ac2600-review ''ASUS Blue Cave'' on '''DigitalCitizen'''] ===Forum threads=== forums] (Maylyn's post) *[http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10135-ASUS-Blue-Cave-amp-Lyra On '''wl500g.info''' forums] (Omega's blog) *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-131799-1-1.html On '''KoolShare''' forums] (PCB images) :• CPU: S6483N03 (SLLFB) [http://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201801/17/115619t843ntytgn333ygd.jpg CPU image] :• Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF1G18AC-TI :• RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI ===News=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.my/tech-news-intels-new-npu-will-manage-your-smart-home-over-100-connected-devices ''Intel AnyWAN GRX750 and XWAY WAV500'' on '''HardwareZone'''] *[https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/smart-home/connected-home/home-wi-fi-chipset-wav500-series-brief.html ''XWAY WAV500 Wi-Fi chipsets'' on '''Intel'''] ([https://ark.intel.com/products/93820/Intel-XWAY-WAV500-Wi-Fi-Chipset ''ARK Belona'']) ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:ASUS Blue Cave.jpg|
[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] ==See also== *ASUS Blue Cave - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9888 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
